page.title: 12SHOPPING IN WIRKSWORTH
page.content: WIRKSWORTH AND THE AREA TO THE S.E. HAVE NO MAJOR SHOPPING FACILITIES. DETAILS OF THE SHOPS ARE INCLUDED IN THE AMENITIES COUNT. IN A SURVEY OF 100 PEOPLE ASKED WHERE THEY DO THEIR DAY TO DAY SHOPPING, WHERE THEY SHOP FOR THE MAIN FAMILY NEEDS AND WHERE THEY SHOP ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS, THE RESPONSES WERE: DAY TO DAY 91 WIRKSWORTH 9 MATLOCK MAIN SHOPPING 7 WIRKSWORTH 54 MATLOCK 17 CHESTERFIELD 19 DERBY 3 NOTTINGHAM SPECIAL 1 WIRKSWORTH 9 MATLOCK 24 CHESTERFIELD 49 DERBY 17 NOTTINGHAM
